description: Snaps the y-value of a feature placement pos to the floor or the ceiling within the provided 'vertical_search_range'. The placement biome is preserved. If the snap position goes outside of the placement biome, placement will fail.

feature_to_snap.description: Named reference of feature to be snapped.

vertical_search_range.description: Range to search for a floor or ceiling for snaping the feature.

surface.description: Defines the surface that the y-value of the placement position will be snapped to.
